properties.title: maven plugins for testing Web Services

section.name: soapUI maven plugins
section.p: soapUI includes plugins for running Web Service tests in both maven 1.x and maven 2.x allowing one to automate Functional test in TestSuites / TestCases, Web Service LoadTests and code generation previously created or configured in soapUI. If any of the plugin tasks fail, an error message will be printed to the console and the execution will exit with an error.
